36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Miqdam bin Ma'dikarib said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah (S.a.w) saying: 'The human does not fill any container that is worse than his stomach. It is sufficient for the son of Adam to eat what will support his back. If this is not possible, then a third for food, a third for drink, and third for his breath

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ كَثْرَةِ الأَكْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked to Eat Much
